contextId.occurrenceNote: Yahweh speaks of Job and himself as if they were two other people to remind Job that no person anywhere should argue with God. Alternate translation: "You want to argue with me, so answer me" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-pronouns]])
contextId.glQuote: He who argues with God, let him answer

contextId.occurrenceNote: Yahweh speaks as if he were another person. Alternate translation: "of my creatures. Only I, God" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-pronouns]])
contextId.glQuote: the creatures of God. Only God
